Construct the numerical finite-difference 2nd derivative by constructing 
$g(x) \equiv \frac{f(x+h) - f(x-h)}{h}$ and then building $\frac{g(x+h) - g(x-h)}{2h}$, substituting in $g(x)$ as it is written in terms of $f()$.
